level.heading: Residency and insurance requirements.
level.text: In addition to other eligibility requirements established pursuant to this chapter, a prospective client shall be a District resident and not have insurance benefits available for substance abuse treatment. A client shall continue to be a resident while participating in the Program.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-146
level.text: For Law 13-146, see notes following ยง 7-3001.
